main event: Several residents in Ashland, Kentucky reported sightings of unidentified flying objects on multiple occasions in late November 1967.
interesting points: Witnesses described seeing silver-colored objects that hovered and moved rapidly across the sky,Some witnesses reported the objects changing colors between red and silver,Multiple residents including police officers and students from the Ramey Home provided corroborating reports of the sightings,One witness mentioned the objects appeared to defy the laws of gravity and would suddenly hover or change direction,The sightings were reported by both individuals and groups, with no physical evidence found.
sighted object: Unidentified flying objects described as silver or round in color
witness description: Residents of the Ramey Home, local police, and other citizens in Ashland
